about_the_game:
Greetings Engineer and Welcome Aboard the Nova Aurora

You enlisted to work aboard the Nova Aurora to ensure it completes its voyage, but years of training did not prepare you for the situation you would find yourself in. You awake from stasis to find yourself as the last Engineer onboard the ship, which is now in disarray.

With the help of the ship AI it is up to you to try to repair the Nova Aurora and get it back on its voyage!

Project: Nova is a VR puzzle game centred around the feelings of astrophobia and isolation. As an Engineer it is your job to find and repair and faults the ship has suffered on its voyage, using your wits and handy tools. Along the way you will need to be careful not to do more harm than you good and find out what exactly happened aboard while you were in stasis.

Key Features

Astrophobia and Isolation

The mood of Project: Nova focusses on the eeriness of an empty ship, devoid of life and humanity, and the fears of space and being lost amongst the stars.

Branching Narrative

As you progress through the ship you will be faced with certain puzzles and decisions which, depending on your outcome, will lead to alternative endings.

These endings range from you surviving your journey, potentially leaving you stranded on the ship, or worse.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers
  • Additional Notes: Tested with HTC Vive, HTC Vive Pro, Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers
  • Additional Notes: Tested with HTC Vive, HTC Vive Pro, Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3

short_description: Project: Nova is a VR Puzzle game centred around the feelings of astrophobia and isolation. As an engineer it's your duty to repair the ship. On your voyage you will be faced with puzzles and decisions which will determine the fate of everyone onboard. Will the passengers survive... will you?
